name: WebWalker
description: Web scraper written in Python with use of Scrapy. Allows user to pull and analyze data from any website through a web front written in React.

name: RedPoint
description: Chat with user accounts, real-life messaging, channels and servers. Written with the use of microservice architectural pattern that allows for great separation between the components user interacts with.

name: RichClousre
description: Cross platform packet protocol analyzer created with use of Pcap API and offers two GUI fronts (AvaloniaUI and WPF). Offers range of functions that allow to filter incoming packets.

name: RichMap
description: A port scanner, live host finder and service banner grabber. Allows to interact with program's functionality through GUI or CLI.

name: nShop
description: A tiny implementation of eCommerence site with use of NodeJS and React. Allows to user's to create accounts and place orders for items managed by owner of the service.

name: NtNotifier
description: Discord bot that I have written for the community of Neotokyo's game server. Monitors activity on public Neotokyo servers and sends out notifications with live updates about status of games.

name: File upload service for dead.tokyo
description: File upload NodeJS service with simple authentication and rate limiting created for the dead.tokyo website.

name: This website
description: This portfolio was created with the use of Vue and TailwindCSS. Full source code can be found in the link below.
